title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PROGRAM (SIP) FOR SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO EIGHT MILLION NINE HUNDRED NINETY-FOUR THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED SEVENTY PESOS AND 71/100 (PHP 8,994,570.71) CHARGEABLE AGAINST BALANCES OF CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS FROM PRIOR YEARS CY 2023-2024; FROM MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND AMOUNTING TO SEVEN MILLION NINE HUNDRED EIGHTY- THREE THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED NINETY-NINE PESOS AND 41/100 (PHP 7,983,599.41) AND FROM MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT FUND AMOUNTING TO TWENTY-SIX MILLION FOUR HUNDRED TWENTY-TWO THOUSAND NINETY-NINE PESOS AND 48/100 (PHP 26,422,099.48) CHARGEABLE AGAINST REPROGRAMMING OF APPROPRIATIONS UNDER THE 20% MDF CURRENT APPROPRIATION (PHP 11,500,000.00) AND CONTINUING APPROPRIATION (PHP 14,922,099.48). Author
